consume(address,uint256).details: Consume user usage, it only can be called by router.

estimateFreeFee(address,uint256).details: Estimate user daily free fee left.

estimateTotalLeft(uint256).details: Estimate total daily free fee left.

estimateUsage((uint256,uint256),uint256).details: Estimate user daily free fee usage.

onAfterBlock().details: After block callback, it only can be called by router,     it will update `globalTimestamp` if the time interval exceeds `freeFeeRecoverInterval`
